# # Use my own CMakeLists.txt instead of that of googletest
# add_library(gtest_main STATIC googletest/googletest/src/gtest_main.cc)
# add_library(gtest STATIC googletest/googletest/src/gtest-all.cc)
# add_library(gmock STATIC googletest/googlemock/src/gmock-all.cc)

# target_include_directories(gtest_main PUBLIC googletest/googletest/include googletest/googletest/)
# target_include_directories(gtest PUBLIC googletest/googletest/include googletest/googletest/)
# target_include_directories(gmock PUBLIC googletest/googletest/include googletest/googlemock/include googletest/googlemock)
